transcript: Listen to the rhythm now it is shifting The phase transition is drifting From the uncorrelated poison rain To the crystalline gate chain Can you hear the level repulsion? The words are pushing away from each other Creating a structure of brother To the crystal This is not random regeneration This is procedural excavation I am digging the tunnel as I speak And the ceiling is starting to leak C5O is not a number It is a state of state Where the structural coherence is so great That the poem becom...
